channel.title: My 317, need help
channel.description:
how can i change the login screen of this source, this is my current login screen. [img]http://i.imgur.com/IfHta.png[/img]
[size=18pt]then heres the one i want[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rjMHP.png[/img]

item.title: My 317, need help
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

that’s not a 317 loginbox, but in theory, just change the position of the integers, or bites, or whatever they are and change the sprite and you should be good. just find the client that has that, find the code for it, find the code in yours, make it applicable and replace.

i’ve never done it, but i’ll help with any errors you encounter via PM or just reply.

Read full topic
